title: Drawing, "Study: Orchid", early 20th century
medium: Graphite, pen and ink, brush and gouache on yellow tracing paper
inscribed: recto: S. L. Crownfield (inscribed by her sister, Gertrude) / No. 7
creditline: Gift of Starling W. Childs and Ward Cheney
description: Vertical sheet depicting an orchid with two blossoms. The flowers are touched with black, white, green and pink while the leaves and stalks are uncolored.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Study: Orchid", early 20th century.
early 20th century. Graphite, pen and ink, brush and gouache on yellow tracing paper. Gift of Starling W. Childs and Ward Cheney. 1937-59-26.
